TwitchToolkit.Incidents.StoreIncidentSim.label: VEE Cargopods weapons
TwitchToolkit.Incidents.StoreIncidentSim.description: Spawns a Cargopods weapons Event from Vanilla Events Expanded --> NOTE: The default price is so high since it generates a big raid, takes all their weapons and then drops the Weapons like a normal droppod.

TwitchToolkit.Incidents.StoreIncidentSim.label: VEE Cargopods Apparel
TwitchToolkit.Incidents.StoreIncidentSim.description: Spawns a Cargopods Apparel Event from Vanilla Events Expanded --> NOTE: The default price is so high since it generates a big raid, takes all their Apparel and then drops the Weapons like a normal droppod.

TwitchToolkit.Incidents.StoreIncidentSim.label: VEE Caravan Animals Wander In
TwitchToolkit.Incidents.StoreIncidentSim.description: Spawns a Caravan Animals Wander In Event from Vanilla Events Expanded --> NOTE: The default price is so high since it generates a Trader Caravan, but then just mangles it into a Animals Wander in Event.
